function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Transmission rate estimation may be inaccurate","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Model comparison may lead to incorrect conclusions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of outdated or invalid models","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative association between closure of bars and restaurants and transmission rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for weather variable in the initial model","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Large aic for model 4 compared to other models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hospital-acquired covid-19 due to airborne transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Presence of other microbial bioaerosols","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air changes in ’surge’ wards and intensive care units icu .","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data on the effectiveness of engineering solutions for improving ventilation and air sterilization.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low awareness of the importance of ventilation and air sterilization in reducing the spread of sars-cov-2 and other contagious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to sars-cov-2 and microbial bioaerosols in a covid-19 ’surge’ ward.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Capture of airborne viruses","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pathogen detection and analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Statistical analyses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in a hospital surge ward and icu","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in the ward before air filter activation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to detect sars-cov-2 rna on control sampler","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High levels of viral, bacterial, and fungal pathogens detected in the air samples from the surge ward","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in the air samples from the surge icu","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Airborne circulation of sars-cov-2 in hospital environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of agreed standard for sampling and detection of airborne viruses","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Aerosol generating procedures increasing respiratory aerosols","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in the air of a ward managing patients with covid-19.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of a range of bacteria, yeasts, and other respiratory viruses in the air of hospital rooms.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding the impact of air filtration on nosocomial infections.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of evidence for sars-cov-2 removal by portable air filtration devices","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain optimal air changes required to remove detectable pathogens","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential artefactual reduction in the viability of sampled virus by air sampling devices","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of airborne sars-cov-2 rna in repurposed covid-19 ’surge ward’","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact on healthcare professional and patient-focused outcomes","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Portable air filtration devices as a mitigation strategy for reduced availability of airborne infection isolation facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restriction of access to public green spaces due to covid-19 social distancing measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lockdown measures leading to decreased social interaction for older adults","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited assessment of the impact of domestic gardens on wellbeing during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of assessment of the contribution of urban green space to wellbeing","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited studies on the impact of domestic gardens on psychosocial factors and physical health during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential lack of information on protective behaviors for prevention of psychiatric disorders during self-isolation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Older adults being advised to remain at home and avoid social contact during covid-19 lockdown.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Postponement of planned follow-up due to covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of existing data and online survey during the covid-19 pandemic for research purposes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survey participants potentially being unaware of their covid-19 status and spreading the virus during in-person interactions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survey participants experiencing negative emotional and psychological health during lockdown, leading to decreased overall well-being.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential bias in the survey data due to exclusion of individuals over the age of 70 who were strongly advised to stay at home during lockdown.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased frequency of garden usage may lead to higher contact and potential spread of contagious diseases in shared spaces.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Anxiety about covid-19 may impact mental health and increase susceptibility to stress-related illnesses.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased outdoor activities, such as gardening, may lead to higher physical activity levels and improved overall wellbeing.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Participants being asked to rate retrospective health measures before and after covid-19 measures may introduce recall bias and subjective interpretation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The use of a 5-point scale for self-rated health measures may lack granularity and sensitivity to capture nuanced changes in health status.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covariate measurements such as living alone, education, and occupational social class may not fully capture the complex socioeconomic and environmental factors influencing health outcomes, leading to confounding effects.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
